resources.string:
Hi, my name is Urbanus. \n\n 1. Explain the various functionalities applicable in the IoT layered architecture • Application layer which contains the IoT applications • Service support and application support has two capability groupings which include  Generic support capabilities which is used by different IoT applications such as data processing or data storage. The capabilities may also be invoked by specific support capabilities  Specific support capabilities which specifically cater for the requirements of diversified applications. • The network layer provides the necessary transport and networking capabilities for routing IoT data processing places. • The device layer e.g. sensors and actuators are used to collect the sensor readings for further processing.
2. What are the network services you expect in a small office/home office network? • Ethernet switch installation. • LAN cable installation. • WIFI installation. • Router installation. • Printing.
